title: Stabilize Artifact v0.1
description: Schema for .ai/task-artifacts/<TASK-ID>/stabilize.yaml generated by the stabilize pass.

taskId.description: Task ID, e.g., "TASK-001". Must match the task ID in the prompt header.

author.description: Name of the operator who initiated the task

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the stabilize artifact was created (generally, the current timestamp). Format: ISO 8601

specReference.description: Reference to the spec artifact used for this stabilization pass

items.description: SHA of the commit that applied the change

anyOf.description: Test summary as an array of strings

unresolvedQuestions.description: List of questions that were not answered during the stabilize pass

items.description: Question that was not answered during the stabilize pass
